channel.title: Port Forward help please
channel.description: for port forwarding i have verizon fios... i make it specify ip: what ip do i use? 127.0.0.1? my no-ip? or my comptuers ip? when i run my server it says its listening on 127.0.0.1:43594 and the port i make it TCP and 43594 i just need help on the ip part please thanks in advance tom

item.title: Port Forward help please
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

I’ve locked this one because your other thread is quite similar. Please refrain from creating multiple topics with the same question.

item.title: Port Forward help please
item.dc:creator: @tompacman tompacman
item.description:
@tompacman wrote:

for port forwarding i have verizon fios…
i make it specify ip: what ip do i use? 127.0.0.1? my no-ip? or my comptuers ip?
when i run my server it says its listening on 127.0.0.1:43594
and the port i make it TCP and 43594
i just need help on the ip part please
thanks in advance
tom
